content:
The head of the Lviv Regional Military Administration, Maksym Kozytskyi, said that during the air raid, which lasted from 05:01 to 06:27 on March 31, 2024, the enemy attacked the same critical infrastructure facility in the Lviv region with cruise missiles, which was its target on March 24 and 29, 2024.

This is stated inmessageMaxim Kozitsky.

Destroyed administration. There was a fire. The firefighters promptly extinguished her.

As a result of the attack, a man was killed.

Now rescuers are disassembled. People can still be under them.

As reported by ArmyInform,DataThe Air Force of the Armed Forces, on the night of March 31, 2024, the Russian invaders attacked 14 winged missiles X-101/X-555, 11 shaped UAVs, Iskander-M ballistic missile and a controlled X-59 aviation missile.

At the same time, Ukraine's air defense shot down 9 Kh-101/Kh-555 cruise missiles and 9 Shahed-136/131 attack UAVs of the Russian occupiers.
title: The enemy attacked the winged rockets of Lviv region: there are victims
description: This is stated in the message of Maxim Kozitsky. Destroyed administration. Was ...
author: Army Inform
